Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Beethoven \Beethoven\ n. 1. Ludwig van Beethoven, a renowned German composer, born 1770, died 1827.
Syn: van Beethoven. [WordNet 1.5]
2. the music of Beethoven. He enjoyed Beethoven most of all. [WordNet 1.5]

Beethoven n 1: German composer of instrumental music (especially symphonic and chamber music); continued to compose after he lost his hearing (1770-1827) [syn: {van Beethoven}, {Ludwig van Beethoven}] 2: the music of Beethoven; "he enjoyed Beethoven most of all"
